invalidRoom.title: You don’t have access to this room.
invalidRoom.body: Please contact the room owner to get invited.
invalidRoom.bodySignedOut: Please sign in and make sure the room owner has invited you to this room.
invalidRoom.subMessageNotSignedIn:
You are currently logged is as {{email}}
You might need to <3>sign out and then sign in with a different email

linkExpired.title:
FPO Oops,
this link is not valid
linkExpired.body: FPO Maybe the link has expired, was revoked, or maybe it was not copied correctly.

invalidLink.title:
Oops,
this link is not valid
invalidLink.body: Maybe the link has expired, was revoked, or maybe it was not copied correctly.

pageNotFound.title: Lost in Space?
pageNotFound.body: It seems like you landed on the wrong place. We suggest you back to home.

roomNotFound.title: The Room is Gone
roomNotFound.body: Seems like the room doesn’t exist anymore.

unexpected.title: Uh oh!
unexpected.body: Our bad, something went wrong. We could show you some scary error message but you should just let us know :)

claimLinkExpired.title: Your invite link has expired
claimLinkExpired.body: The most likely explanation is that your invite link is too old. Contact us and we will sort it out!

joinRoomExpired.title: Your invite link has expired
joinRoomExpired.body:
The most likely explanation is that your invite link is too old.

Please ask the room owner to invite you to the room again.

signup.title: Sign Up

email.label: Email Address
email.maxSize: Email must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters

firstName.label: First name
firstName.maxSize: First name must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters

lastName.label: Last name
lastName.maxSize: Last name must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters

tos.label: I agree to the <1>Terms of Service</1>

signup.imgAltText: A key floating magically in the air. A With logo is emblazoned on the attached key tag.
signup.invitationDestination: We sent a confirmation link to <1>{{email}}</1>
signup.invitationHelp: If you didn't receive the email, you can <1>request a new link</1>. Don't forget to check your spam folder!
signup.invitationImgAltText: A postmarked letter flying through the air

newsletterOptIn.label: Please send me how-to guides and updates

signup.alreadyRegistered: You've got a With account already — please sign in!
signup.joinFlow: You'll need an account to join someone's room. After you've created one, try clicking that link again.
signup.earlyAccessAccept: By signing up to With Early Access, you agree to receive occasional emails asking for your feedback. As one of our first users, your input will help us make With even better.

confirmationView.title: Check your email
confirmationView.bodyText:
We sent a magic link to {{email}}

Click on the link in the email and you will be automatically logged in.

If you didn’t receive the email, you can <3>request a new link. Don't forget to check your spam folder!
confirmationView.snackSuccessMsg: We just sent you new magic link.

room.analyticsDisclaimer: We use analytics software to improve Tilde. Please feel free to come back later, when we've made it optional.

subscribe.title: You are now subscribed!
subscribe.body: You will now receive tips on how to use Tilde and news about updates.

unsubscribe.title: You’ve been unsubscribed
unsubscribe.body: If you have a moment, please let us know why you unsubscribed

meetingLink.explanationText: Share the meeting link with your guest, or join the room now if you would like to try Tilde.

meetingSelect.titleText: What kind of meeting room do you need?

notSupported.title: Oops, we’re sorry.
notSupported.body:
We're sorry, Tilde is currently not optimized for mobile devices.

Please use one of the recommended browsers on your computer instead: Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, or Microsoft Edge.

postMeeting.surveyThanks: Thanks for helping us make Tilde better!
postMeeting.negativeFeedbackPrompt: We're sorry it didn't go great...
postMeeting.title: Thank you for using Tilde!
postMeeting.ratingCaption:
To make sure we're providing you with the best possible app,
please rate your experience

licenses.title: Open Source Software Licenses
licenses.intro: Tilde utilizes open source and third party software in various forms throughout the app. The following sets forth attribution notices for third party software that may be contained in portions of the product.

link.name: Link
link.confirmCloseTabDuringUpload: A file upload is in progress and may not complete. Are you sure you want to leave?

huddle.name: Huddle
huddle.explainer: Move inside to have a private conversation

RESOLVED_OTP.title: This link has already been used.
RESOLVED_OTP.body: For your security, some links can only be used once.

INVALID_LINK.title: Oops, this link appears to be incomplete.
INVALID_LINK.body: Please make sure you copied the complete link.

EXPIRED_OTP.title: This link has expired
EXPIRED_OTP.body: This one-time link has expired. Please sign in and request a new one-time link.

INVITE_EXPIRED.title: Oops, this link appears to be expired.
INVITE_EXPIRED.body: Someone might have revoked this link. Please ask a room admin for a new link.

NOT_LOGGED_IN.title: Please sign in.
NOT_LOGGED_IN.body: You need to be signed in to use this link. Please sign in.

UNAUTHORIZED_ROOM_ACCESS.title: Oops, you don't have access to this room anymore.
UNAUTHORIZED_ROOM_ACCESS.body: Please ask the room owner for access again.

messages.provideValidYoutubeUrl: Please provide a valid YouTube URL
messages.malformedUrl: Please check to make sure URL has been properly copied from the email.
messages.mobileNotOptimized: Tilde is currently not optimized for mobile. We'd rather polish the experience before you can use it. Sorry for the inconvenience.
messages.noRoomPassword: You need a password to join this room
messages.incorrectRoomPassword: The password you entered is incorrect
messages.noRoomAccess: You don't have access to this room. You'll need the password to get in.
messages.joinRoomInvalidScreenName: Please provide a valid screen name.
messages.joinRoomUnknownFailure: Failed to join room - check your network connection.
messages.fileTooLarge: Too large: files up to {{maxMegabytes}}MB only
messages.catastrophicMediaError: Something went very wrong while activating your media device. Try refreshing the page to see if that helps.
messages.socketReconnectingDetails: Connection interrupted - check your internet status.
messages.mediaReconnectingDetails: Audio and video are temporarily unavailable
messages.socketUnavailable: We couldn't connect to our servers. Check your internet status and contact us if this persists.
messages.maxRoomNameCharacters: Room name cannot be more then {{maxChar}} characters.
messages.checkboxRequired: Please check this box to proceed
messages.roomAccess: You aren't a member of this room. Ask the room owner for an invite.
messages.defaultRoomSetFailed: We couldn't set your default room. Try again in a moment.
messages.genericUnexpected: Something went wrong, please try again

widgetsFallback.title: Accessories error
widgetsFallback.msg: An error occurred while setting up the room's accessories. Try refreshing the page and rejoining the room to fix this error.

unexpectedModal.title: Well, this is awkward...
unexpectedModal.msg: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try refreshing the page and rejoining the room.

TOO_MANY_OWNED_ROOMS.message: You have reached your limit of number of rooms you can create.

UNEXPECTED.message: Something unexpected has happened. Please try again later.

media.title: {{device}} access has been denied.
media.supportText: Instructions for enabling your {{device}} access can be found in the <3>Tilde help portal.</3>
media.audioPermissionDismissed: If you want to share your voice, we'll need microphone access. Press the button to enable your mic, then choose "Allow"
media.audioPermissionDenied: You've told your browser not to allow microphone access for Tilde. Change that setting to start sharing your voice.
media.videoPermissionDismissed: If you want to share your video, we'll need camera access. Press the button to enable your camera, then choose "Allow"
media.videoPermissionDenied: You've told your browser not to allow camera access for Tilde. Change that setting to start sharing your video.
media.screenSharePermissionDismissed: If you want to share your screen, we'll need access. Press the button to share your screen, then choose "Allow"
media.screenSharePermissionDenied: You've told your browser not to allow screen share access for Tilde. Change that setting to start sharing your screen.
media.unexpectedMediaRequestFail:
Something unexpected happened when requesting your device permissions.

Please double check your <1>browser settings and try again.

If this issue persists, please contact us directly at <3>support@tilde.so.

roomMangement.createRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while creating the room.
roomMangement.renameRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while renaming the room.
roomMangement.deleteRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while deleting the room.
roomMangement.leaveRoomErrorTitle: Oops! There was an error while leaving the room.
roomMangement.message: Please retry. If that keeps happening, please <1>contact us</1> and we will sort it out.

twilioFailure.explainer: We lost our media connection (sorry!). Audio and video are unavailable. Check your internet status, try refreshing, and <1>contact us</1> if this persists.

room.customWallpaperLabel: Link to an image ( {{fileTypes}} are supported )

omnibar.label: Quick action bar
omnibar.quickActionEmpty: Type or paste links and notes to add them to the room.
omnibar.quickActionEmptyMobile: Type or paste links and notes, or select an action below.

paste.modalDetails: Are you sure you want to add this to the room?

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.massiveRoomExplainer: Warning: very experimental! Removes the boundaries on your room, letting you move and place accessories anywhere you like. You can turn this back off, but your accessories will be re-arranged if you do.

move.details: To break out in groups in a Tilde room, drag your avatar wherever you want to go. Try it now!
move.title: Move & Break out

addWidgets.title: Add content to the room
addWidgets.details: You can add many kinds of content to the room. Try it now! Click on one of the icons at the bottom of the window.

persistence.title: Rooms are persistent
persistence.details: All the widgets you create and the files your upload are automatically saved in the room. Bookmark this page and come back at any time and everything will still be there.

makeYourOwn.title: Your own Tilde rooms
makeYourOwn.details: Tilde offers free and instant meeting rooms for all your collaborative needs.

wallpaperModal.title: Room wallpaper
wallpaperModal.customWallpaperTitle: Link to an image ({{fileTypes}} are supported)

displayNameInput.label: Display Name
displayNameInput.helperText: Name that is displayed in the room
displayNameInput.maxSize: Display name must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters

bugReportModal.title: Report a bug
bugReportModal.confirmationText:
Report sent successfully

Thanks for helping us build a better product!
bugReportModal.errorMessage: Something unexpected has happened. Please contact us directly at support@tilde.so.

devicePermissionsModal.title: Audio & video access
devicePermissionsModal.permissionExplanationText:
For others to see and hear you, your browser needs access to your microphone and to your camera.

You can turn them off at any time.
devicePermissionsModal.setupExplanation: Take a moment to set up your camera and microphone if you like.
devicePermissionsModal.permissionDeniedExplanation: Oops! Seems like Tilde doesn’t have access to your camera and microphone.

tos.label: I agree to the <1>Terms of Service</1>

confirmCode.title: Verify code
confirmCode.explainationText: Please enter the 6 digit-code we just sent at {{email}} to finalize your account.

unsaved.title: Meeting room unsaved
unsaved.infoText: This meeting room and all the content you or other people have added will disappear after 48 hours.
unsaved.explainationText: You need a free Tilde account to persist the content of this meeting.

userEntry.maxSize: Display name must be less than {{maxNameLength}} characters
